text:
Yup, great song from this game! I loved what they did withthis title on the N64, I wish they would've done another game like this (Mystical Ninja 2 on the N64 was great, but different).
But this franchise is probably dead by now :(

It pains me greatly that the Goemon series is practically dead. I loved it and it's music so much.

Their remixes are awesome but still, fuck pachislot.
